CustomField.description: EMEA_SOW_StandardBank_009: Requirement to notify (email) the Client owner when an opportunity is created on the Client by a different user (i.e., who does not own the Client).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Notify me by email when an opportunity is created for a Client I own by a different user (i.e., who does not own the Client).
CustomField.label: Notify when Opportunity created by other
